name: Canberra Cycling Club

heroSection.customHTML:
Welcome to the Canberra Cycling Club

Join us on thrilling rides through the beautiful landscapes of Canberra.

Explore Our Rides

customSections.title: About Us
customSections.customHTML:
About the Club

We are a community passionate about cycling. Our mission is to promote cycling as a sport and a healthy lifestyle.

Whether you’re a seasoned cyclist or just starting out, there’s a place for you here.

customSections.title: Upcoming Events
customSections.customHTML:
Upcoming Events

Monthly Group Ride

Join us for our monthly group ride every first Saturday of the month. All skill levels welcome!

Annual Charity Ride

Help us raise funds for local charities while enjoying a beautiful ride through the city.

customSections.title: Join Us
customSections.customHTML:
Become a Member

Whether you want to compete, commute, or just enjoy leisurely rides, become part of our community today!

Sign Up Now

services.title: Group Rides
services.description: Participate in weekly rides led by experienced cyclists to improve your skills and meet fellow members.

services.title: Training Programs
services.description: Join our structured training programs to enhance your cycling performance and achieve your personal goals.

services.title: Social Events
services.description: Enjoy various social gatherings that provide a perfect opportunity for members to connect and have fun.

testimonials.name: John D.
testimonials.review: The Canberra Cycling Club has transformed my cycling experience. I’ve met great friends and improved my skills dramatically!

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.review: I love the support and camaraderie at the club. The rides are well organized, and the atmosphere is always friendly.

footer.customHTML: © 2023 Canberra Cycling Club. All rights reserved.

Welcome to the Canberra Cycling Club

Join us on thrilling rides through the beautiful landscapes of Canberra.

Explore Our Rides

About the Club

We are a community passionate about cycling. Our mission is to promote cycling as a sport and a healthy lifestyle.

Whether you’re a seasoned cyclist or just starting out, there’s a place for you here.

Upcoming Events

Monthly Group Ride

Join us for our monthly group ride every first Saturday of the month. All skill levels welcome!

Annual Charity Ride

Help us raise funds for local charities while enjoying a beautiful ride through the city.

Become a Member

Whether you want to compete, commute, or just enjoy leisurely rides, become part of our community today!

Sign Up Now

What Our Members Say

"The Canberra Cycling Club has transformed my cycling experience. I’ve met great friends and improved my skills dramatically!"
- John D.
"I love the support and camaraderie at the club. The rides are well organized, and the atmosphere is always friendly."
- Sarah L.

Contact Us

Have a question? Get in touch with us!

Phone: (02) 1234 5678

Email: info@canberracyclingclub.org.au

Address: 123 Cycling St, Canberra, ACT 2600
